getMinorTickCount

public int getMinorTickCount(int majorTickIndex)
Returns the number of minor tick marks within each major one The last major tick may have less minors that the other.

Specified by:
getMinorTickCount in interface Axis
Overrides:
getMinorTickCount in class Axis.AbstractAxis
Returns:
the number of minor tick marks within each major one By default all major ticks have the same number of minor ticks except the last which has none.
